column3:
Translation changes should be submitted on transifex - https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/ and register as translator for free.

We cannot pull translations submitted like this because the next pull from transifex would overwrite them again.

I've fixed in Transifex. Is there anything else I need to do except save the edit? There doesn't seem to be a way to explain the severity or implications of this mistranslation, and I want to make sure the reviewers realize the error.\n
So long as it is fixed in Transifex it will be pulled into the core the next release cycle.\n
